gameDetails.name: Kingdom Builder: The Island
gameDetails.description: Kingdom Builder: Island is a mini expansion for the game Kingdom Builder. Provided for Kickstarter backers, this expansion will be available for sale separately at a future date. It consists of a single double-sided map tile depicting an island on both sides. One side features a Rope Bridge (move a settlement onto Canyon) and the other side features a Tree House (move a settlement onto Forest) with both sides featuring a city.
